pr_title: RHDM-1145: [DMN Designer] Java Date field is not converted to DMN date type

timeline.message:
RHDM-1145: [DMN Designer] Java Date field is not converted to DMN date type
DROOLS-4977: [DMN Designer] Refactor DataObjectsServiceImpl to not duplicate logic from ParseHelper

timeline.bodyText: Looks like you'll need to change this to use JavaBackedType.determineTypeFromClass(..). See here.
timeline.author: manstis
